data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 3, Kawasaki are pushing forward but Taisei Miyashiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 5, Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 7, Kawasaki's Shintaro Kurumaya goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Kawasaki's Kyohei Noborizato fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
In the minute 10, Manabu Saito for Kawasaki drives towards goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 11, Hayato Shimizu awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 15, In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Manabu Saito. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kawasaki push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Diogo Mateus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shimizu defence.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 17, Kawasaki's Diogo Mateus misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki attack through Reo Hatate. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Kawasaki drives forward and Manabu Saito gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 19, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Keita Nakamura (Shimizu) strikes at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium but his header is cleared.
In Kawasaki, Leandro Damiao of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Goal! Reo Hatate gives Kawasaki a 1-0 lead in Kawasaki.
Hokuto Shimoda instrumental with a fine assist.
Important block from the Shimizu defence as Hidemasa Morita fires in a strike for Kawasaki.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 25, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Hayato Shimizu awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 32, Kawasaki are coming forward and Leandro Damiao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
Shimizu push upfield but Hayato Shimizu quickly pulls them for offside.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Free kick Shimizu.
Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Kawasaki.
In the minute 41, Hayato Shimizu signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Kawasaki's area.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
In the minute 42, Yugo Tatsuta (Shimizu) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 44, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Manabu Saito (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Important block from the Shimizu defence as Taisei Miyashiro fires in a strike for Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 45, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
The first-half is over at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 46, Hayato Shimizu has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Shimizu.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 47, Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 49, Kawasaki's Manabu Saito breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 49, In Kawasaki Kawasaki attack through Kyohei Noborizato. The finish is off target, however.
Hayato Shimizu awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Manabu Saito of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! Leandro Damiao extends Kawasaki's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 51, Kyohei Noborizato with an assist there.
Leandro Damiao gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
Shimizu's Takashi Kanai is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu attack but Renato Augusto's header doesn't find the target.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Kawasaki's Reo Hatate breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Taisei Miyashiro (Kawasaki) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 56, Hayato Shimizu awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Kawasaki's Reo Hatate attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Junior Dutra is replacing Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
The away team replace Takashi Kanai with Hideki Ishige.
In the minute 62, Manabu Saito (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 64, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Hokuto Shimoda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
In the minute 67, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Shota Kaneko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kawasaki defence.
In the minute 68, Kawasaki will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Shimizu.
The home team have replaced Manabu Saito with Kaoru Mitoma. This is the first substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a second substitution, with Ryota Ohshima replacing Hokuto Shimoda.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Ryota Ohshima, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 71, In Kawasaki, Kazuya Yamamura (Kawasaki) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's fourth substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Yosuke Kawai replacing Ryo Takeuchi.
In the minute 73, Yuito Suzuki is replacing Shota Kaneko for the away team.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 3-0 through Reo Hatate.
In the minute 74, Great play from Leandro Damiao to set up the goal.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Kengo Nakamura gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a third substitution, with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Reo Hatate with Kengo Nakamura. This is the fourth substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
In the minute 78, Free kick Shimizu.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In Kawasaki, Kengo Nakamura of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 80, Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Kaoru Mitoma of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kawasaki to check on Yugo Tatsuta, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 84, The away team has substituted Yugo Tatsuta with Riyo Kawamoto. Peter Cklamovski is thus making his fifth change.
Kengo Nakamura puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-0.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 5-0 through Kaoru Mitoma.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Toru Oniki is making the team's fifth substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Shogo Taniguchi replacing Kyohei Noborizato.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Shimizu.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Kawasaki.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Yu Kobayashi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki are caught offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 5-0.
